name: Doriath
startIntroPart1: Hail thee, King Thingol, mightiest of the rulers of Beleriand. Where the ancient trees whisper tales of yore, lies the realm of Doriath, shrouded in the mists of enchantment.
startIntroPart2: Here, the Elves dwell in harmony with nature, their wisdom deep as the roots of the mighty oaks that stand sentinel over their lands.
declaringWar: With a heavy heart, we must draw our swords against the encroaching darkness, for the peace of our realm is threatened by thy shadow.
attacked: Lo! The foe hath breached our borders, and the cries of battle echo through the glades, stirring the hearts of our kin.
defeated: Alas, we have suffered a grievous blow, yet our spirit remains unbroken, for the light of Elbereth shall guide us still.
introduction: Hail, wanderer! Thou art welcomed to Doriath, a land of beauty and peril, where the stars shine bright and the shadows linger long.
neutralHello: Well met, traveler of distant lands.
neutralLetsHearIt: Speak, for I am eager to listen.
Let us share words beneath the boughs.
neutralNo: Nay, I cannot abide such folly.
That is not the way of our kin.
neutralYes: Aye, I shall lend mine ear.
hateHello: Thou art not welcome in these sacred woods.
hateLetsHearIt: What dost thou seek in our realm?
Speak quickly, for I tire of thy presence.
hateNo: Nay, I shall not entertain such notions.
Thou art a stranger here, and thy words fall on deaf ears.
I reject thy offer with disdain.
hateYes: I shall not ally with thee.
Thy kind brings naught but strife.
Leave this place, or face the wrath of our kin.
afterPeace: Though the storm hath passed, we remain vigilant, for peace is a fragile blossom in the wilds of Beleriand.
tradeRequest: Let us barter in good faith, for the fruits of our labor may yet bring prosperity to both our peoples.

name: Aliens
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
